examples.sentence: Urban life provides access to diverse job opportunities, social networks, and entertainment options.
In many urban areas, the cost of living is high, making it challenging for some to afford the amenities that make urban life so attractive.
Despite the challenges, urban life has a unique charm that draws people from all over the world.
City dwellers may also face challenges such as traffic congestion and high cost of living.
As a city dweller, I've learned to appreciate the convenience of having everything I need within walking distance.
For a nature lover like me, becoming a city dweller was a bit of a shock at first.

translations.meaning: thuộc về thủ đô hoặc vùng trung tâm

examples.sentence: Many large corporations have their headquarters located in the metropolitan regions of major cities.
Urban sprawl has resulted in many metropolitan areas becoming increasingly spread out and difficult to navigate.
As a writer living in a small town, I sometimes find myself yearning for the cultural diversity and opportunities available in a metropolitan area.
Nightlife can be an exciting part of urban life for those who enjoy socializing and experiencing new things.
The city is known for its vibrant nightlife, with numerous bars and clubs open until the early hours of the morning.
If you're new to the city and want to experience the local nightlife, it's a good idea to go out with a group of friends for safety.
Traffic jams are common in urban areas during rush hour when many people are commuting to and from work.
The city really needs to invest in public transportation to help alleviate traffic jams during rush hour.
I always leave extra early for appointments because you never know when you're going to get caught in a traffic jam.
Living in an urban area can sometimes be depressing due to factors such as pollution, crime, or social isolation.
The never-ending concrete jungle of the city can be quite depressing, especially when you crave a connection with nature.
The high cost of living in cities can be depressing for many people, who have to work long hours just to make ends meet.
People who live in urban areas may feel exhausted due to long commutes and busy schedules.
After a long day at work, I feel exhausted from navigating the crowded streets and rushing to catch the subway.
Trying to balance work, social life, and navigating the city can leave you feeling exhausted.
Urban areas can be crowded due to high population density.
The metro is always crowded during peak hours, so I am rarely able to find a seat.
One downside of living in a crowded city is the lack of personal space.
Urban areas often have higher crime rates than rural areas due to factors like poverty and population density.
Many people choose to move to the suburbs because they perceive the crime rate to be lower than central areas.
The high crime rate in the city has made many residents concerned for their safety.
The convenience of online shopping has made it easier for urban dwellers to get what they need without leaving their homes.
Many people choose to live in small apartments in the city because it is more convenient for their work commute and social life.
Living near a major transportation hub can be very convenient for those who need to travel frequently for work or pleasure.

translations.meaning: mệt mỏi do căng thẳng kéo dài

examples.sentence: Urban lifestyle can lead to burnout if you don't prioritize self-care.
Urban life can be exciting, but it can also be overwhelming and lead to burnout if you don't learn to manage stress.
It's important to recognize the signs of burnout and take a break from the city from time to time to recharge.
The traffic in the city can be so congested that it creates dangerous driving conditions, leading to more accidents.
The sidewalks in the downtown area are so congested that it's hard to walk without bumping into people.
The parking lot is so congested that it took me half an hour just to find a spot.
Living in the suburb allows for a quieter and more peaceful lifestyle compared to the busy city center.
While the city may offer more job opportunities, the suburb provides a better quality of life for those who prioritize work-life balance.
Living in the suburb can mean longer commutes to work, but many find the trade-off of a peaceful home life worth it.
The new resident of the apartment building complained about the noise level from the street below.
As a long-time resident of the city, I have seen many changes in the urban landscape over the years.
The local government is working to improve public transportation options for city residents.
The streets in residential areas are often lined with trees, giving the neighborhoods a more natural feel.
It is not uncommon for residential areas to have community centers or parks that promote social interaction and outdoor activities.
The commercial area of the city is undergoing a major transformation, with many old buildings being torn down to make way for modern office towers.
The commercial area of the city is always bustling with activity during the day, with shops, offices, and restaurants to the needs of the residents.
The city has a dedicated industrial area where most of the factories and manufacturing plants are located.
The residents of the nearby residential area have been complaining about the pollution coming from the industrial area.
The city council has approved funding for the construction of several new amenities, including a community center and dog park.
Many people are attracted to urban living because of the amenities available in the area, such as shopping centers and entertainment services.
As more people move to the city, there is a growing demand for amenities such as restaurants, cafes, and shops to meet their needs.
Living in a big city requires one to keep up with the fast-paced lifestyle, which can be overwhelming for some people.
In a fast-paced city, it's important to find ways to slow down and relax, such as practicing yoga or meditation.
The fast-paced lifestyle of the city often means that people are always on the go, with little time to stop and appreciate the small things in life.
After living in a fast-paced city for years, she decided to move to a small town with a more laid-back lifestyle.
Despite being in the heart of the city, the neighborhood has a laid-back vibe with plenty of parks and green spaces.
This small town may not have all the amenities of a big city, but it's a great place to live a laid-back life.
As a pedestrian, you should always be aware of your surroundings and follow traffic rules.
The pedestrian bridge over the river is one of the city's most popular attractions, offering stunning views.
Pedestrian safety has become a major concern for the city after a recent spike in accidents involving walkers and cyclists.
The pavement was cracked and uneven, making it difficult to walk.
The pavement was slick with rain, and I almost slipped while walking to work.
The pavement outside my apartment building is often littered with trash and needs to be cleaned more regularly.
Even with a good job, it can be tough to make ends meet in the city when the cost of groceries, transportation, and other expenses keep increasing.
The high rent prices in the city often make it difficult for young professionals to make ends meet, despite their decent salaries.
For many low-income families in the city, making ends meet means sacrificing basic necessities such as healthcare and healthy food.
The city's green spaces and accessible transportation options make it a place that is definitely worth living in.
The city's excellent healthcare facilities and education options make it a place that is worth living in.
The city's bustling economy and job market make it a place that is worth living in for those seeking career growth and opportunities.

translations.meaning: phương tiện giao thông công cộng

examples.sentence: Many city residents rely on public transport to commute to work, as driving in the congested streets can be time-consuming, expensive, and stressful.
The government is investing in expanding the city's public transport system to reduce traffic congestion and encourage more sustainable transportation.
Using public transport instead of driving can save people money on fuel and parking, as well as reduce their carbon footprint.
A hectic pace of life can have negative impacts on physical and mental health.
Some people thrive on a hectic pace of life, while others find it draining and exhausting.
Despite the hectic pace of life, many urban dwellers find ways to slow down and relax amidst the chaos.
This apartment may be small, but it's a good value for money in this expensive city.
I decided to shop at this store because they have high-quality products at a good value for money.
The public transportation system in this city is reliable and a good value for money.
Living in a high-rise building puts you at a higher risk of fire accidents.
Walking alone at night puts you at a higher risk of being a victim of crime.
People who consume a lot of fast food are at a higher risk of various diseases and health problems.
Living in a big city means having to pay higher prices for basic necessities like groceries and rent.
Famous restaurants often charge higher prices for their food and drinks.
Being located near public transportation can be convenient, but also means that you will have to pay higher prices for properties.

translations.meaning: đối mặt khó khăn về tài chính

examples.sentence: People who live in urban areas may face financial difficulty due to high living costs or job loss.
The rising rent prices in urban centers are causing many residents to face financial difficulty.
Despite working multiple jobs, some people in urban areas still face financial difficulty.
City living can provide access to a variety of job opportunities in different industries.
One of the benefits of living in an urban area is having access to high-quality medical facilities.
Many urban areas have parks and outdoor spaces that are accessible to residents, providing opportunities for exercise and recreation.
